column5: SMRT OBLN WKHS OTLK RVLT No amazon partner is this cheap get it while its Hot Amazon all over the news about expanding
SMRT Amazon all over Fox Business Channel They are taking over Expanding Stein Mart will be mentioned soon and you are in cheap
SMRT Hang tough No amazon partner out here with stock this cheap

SMRT retaildivecomnewssteinm Stein Mart on Tuesday announced that it is installing selfservice Amazon Hub Lockers in nearly 200 of its stores across 28 states The retailer operates 283 stores across 30 states according to a Stein Mart press release By early June Amazon customers will be able to pick up and return Amazon packages in secure selfservice kiosks During checkout users will be able to select a locker at the nearest Stein Mart as their shipping address When the package is ready the customer will receive an email with a barcode that can be used to pick it up during store hours the retailer said Stein Mart joins Kohls which is taking and processing returns at all its locations nationwide as of July in sharing store space with the ecommerce giant
SMRT Just low volume so any transaction can make a difference once volume picks up look out
